body_html:
@peterjc123 I want to flag you, because this commit undos a few changes to FindCUDA.cmake that you applied in 737aba3 and aa91193. The Windows CI is passing with these changes, so I am wondering if there is a more specific configuration where your edits were necessary. If not, we'll just take these changes verbatim.

EDIT: Upstream changes related to: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/merge_requests/1631

body:
@peterjc123 I want to flag you, because this commit undos a few changes to FindCUDA.cmake that you applied in 737aba3fc5ed009cd91a48715bf7765b6cb8a1a1 and aa911939a328eff55c9b28b39ed3c43507ba8a2a. The Windows CI is passing with these changes, so I am wondering if there is a more specific configuration where your edits were necessary. If not, we'll just take these changes verbatim.

EDIT: Upstream changes related to: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/merge_requests/1631
